tablerow.td: Pushed back. Opponent is pushed away from the attacker. Attacker chooses where.
Off Hand. Defender makes a willpower save or drops what they are holding. Gloves give them +2 on the save, Gauntlets + 4.
Favoured Hand. Defender makes a willpower save or drops what they are holding. Gloves give them +2 on the save, Gauntlets + 4. Then the defender makes an armour save for their gloves/gauntlets
If the attack hits the defender makes an armour save. Armour Broken Reduce armour class by half the armours AC Bonus until the armour is repaired or replaced.
Dazzling display. Opponent makes a morale test.
Head. The defender makes a Agility Check vs 10 or takes full damage and is dazed. Wearing a leather cap or hat gives +1, a lesser helm gives +2 and a greater helm gives + 3 to the check.
Called shot. Double damage and the attacker chooses a hit location from above.
